properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern USVI and Culebra out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 10:25AM AST until February 19 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are now expected by this afternoon...

.A northerly swell with enhanced winds will result in hazardous
seas beginning this afternoon, and persisting through at least
Wednesday. Most of our local waters will be impacted by the seas
generated by the winds. Atlantic waters and passages will be
impacted by the swell from the north.

* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet by Tuesday with east winds 15 to 20 kt
and gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northern USVI and Culebra out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 8 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous for small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 8 PM AST WEDNESDAY
